reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful with its subtle sparkle and appreciate its fit, with one mentioning it accommodates a pregnant belly perfectly. They describe it as comfortable, great quality, and extremely flattering. The length receives mixed feedback - while some find it perfect, others say it's too long for their height. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding it true to size while others say it runs large. The material quality also gets mixed reviews, with some praising it while others find it cheap. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant gown comfortable fit.
items.body: Beautiful fit. Medium size 6-8. Great evening gown. Elegant style. Comfortable. A little long needed to hem but totally worth it. No faja needed as fabric is very giving in waist belly area. Read more
items.author: Bibi S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous, Comfortable Gown
items.body: The dress is just beautiful! I was worried it was a bit matronly but it was actually perfect. I wore this to my husband’s military awards banquet. It’s pretty low cut in the front which I’m not used to flaunting but my husband thought it was perfect ;) I’m chubby and over 40 so finding a dress is stressful and not fun- but this dress camouflaged all my insecurities. The material is light, stretchy, and drapes beautifully, it flowed while walking which made me feel like a princess. I’m a little taller than 5’7 and with heels this still dusted the floor. Read more
items.author: Laura W.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ever-Pretty for the WIN!
items.body: Purchased for a gala. Very comfortable. Good stretch. V neck is not crazy low. Affordable and elegant! Read more
items.author: Sylvia Bearden Braden

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Forgiving, stretchy style likely to look good on most figures.
items.body: This dress runs a full size too big. Very low cut especially if you have a full bust… lots of cleavage. Size down if between sizes. At 5’8”, 140 lb, size 6 was right size for me. Fabric is a soft and stretchy knit, but not particularly high quality. However, you are unlikely to wear this type of dress very often, so maybe not a big factor in purchase. Silver metallic vertical stripe woven into fabric gives the sparkle appearance. Sleeves are more of three quarter unless you are short. Length is ok for me with flat or a very low heel. Not overly dressy for a formal. So, will definitely need to accessorize. A great choice for an inexpensive formal if it is unlikely to be worn often. Very forgiving style, likely to look good on most figures. Colors aren’t bright… green is a very dark Hunter green. Read more
items.author: Cindy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous gown - unbeatable price.
items.body: One of the best Amazon finds ever... looks like a really expensive gown. Bonus... it's super comfy! Read more
items.author: ValMent

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Size up
items.body: The dress was beautiful but did not fit…zipper would not zip in upper back area. Ordered the correct US Size 14, however, not ideal for 40C chest. Found same dress at a local boutique and wound up paying 1.5x more there than Amazon due to a reorder delivery timeframe was outside my event window. Read more
items.author: Ana Tinajero

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love
items.body: Love this dress. Comfy and fitted perfectly. Read more
items.author: Nicky

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Dont believe the washing instructions.
items.body: So, I love this dress when I tried it on. It is beautiful, breathable and made my girls look good. The sleeves was just a tad short. Now, why I gave this a 3 is because when I washed this dress and I followed the instructions and I did not dry it I hung it to dry. It did not look the same as when I tried it on originally. It didnt hold up it got a small hole in the sleeve and the bottom of the dress looked a little frayed. So I didnt get to wear it as I went with my back up from Torrid. Which I am still sad about because its was a beautiful dress but I dont buy clothes to wear once and not be able to wash it or dry clean it. Read more
items.author: Jessica

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Formal Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Formal Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Olive, Sparkling Grape, White, Deep Green, Burgundy, Burnt Orange, Purple Wisteria, Black, Teal, Navy Blue, Sapphire Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
